DOC.brief_summary: This study examine cognitive rehabilitation protocol target work memory deficit adult child Traumatic Brain Injury ( TBI ) . In randomized clinical trial , efficacy Cogmed , cognitive rehabilitation protocol design improve work memory , examine child TBI . Neuropsychological daily life functioning measure . Participants child ( N=20 ) adult ( N=20 ) document history TBI . Participants randomize treatment group wait list control group . The Experimental Group receive Cogmed work memory train program 30-40 minute per day , 5 day week 5 week total training time approximately 15 hour . The Control Group wait list control group cross treatment follow-up assessment . All subject undergo repeat assessment follow completion work memory training protocol 7th week 13 week document change work memory performance .
DOC.criteria: History Traumatic Brain Injury Diagnosis neurological condition
